revised_title: Observations on Razor Notches and Hair Structure
tldr: In this letter, Antony van Leeuwenhoek investigates the effects of razor notches on hair and muscle fibers using a microscope. He observes that the notches in a razor can cause tearing and mangle hair roots, and also create visible streaks in muscle fibers. Van Leeuwenhoek also notes the variety in hair structure and the small size of muscle fibers.
